data.title: Residence Life & Housing
data.text:
A double-room rate is assigned to any room that has a maximum occupancy of two people. On rare occasions, this includes some single rooms around campus.

Buildings that have rooms at the double-room rate:

Arend

Baldwin-Jenkins

Ballard

Duvall

McMillan

Oliver

The Village (Akili, Shalom and Tiki)

Warren

A triple/quad rate is assigned to any room that has an occupancy of three or more people.

Buildings that have rooms at the triple/quad rate:

Arend

Baldwin-Jenkins

Ballard

Duvall

McMillan

Oliver

Stewart

The Village (Akili, Shalom and Tiki)

Warren

A single-room rate is assigned to rooms that have a maximum occupancy of one person. However, not all one-person rooms are assigned the single-room rate; some one-person rooms carry the double-room rate.

Buildings that have rooms at the single-room rate:

Arend

Ballard

McMillan

Oliver

Stewart

Warren
